mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') from board order by reg_date DESC, bno DESC
select bno, title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date from board order by reg_date DESC, bno DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT bno, title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date FROM board WHERE true
ORDER BY reg_date DESC, bno DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE true

choose.otherwise: AND title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')

mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, up_date = now() where bno = #{bno}
update board set comment_cnt = comment_cnt + #{cnt} where bno = #{bno}
update board set view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 where bno = #{bno}
mapper.delete: delete from board where bno = #{bno} and writer = #{writer}
